name: How to Bee a MailBee
description:
You are a Intern to Become a MailBee at Bee-Happy Co.

So you Need to Train your MailBee Skills by

Transferring Packages to their Rightful Recipients, While Maneuvering Through Air and Avoiding Red Walls.

But Remember, You Need to do it Quick Otherwise You’ll Ran out of Space to Fly in!

Controls 
  • Flying - WASD / Arrows
  • Grab/Hold - Space
  • Restart - R
  • Fullscreen Toggle - F11
  • Exit - Esc                
Known Issues 
  • MacOS: LowFps

                 

Made with 
  • GameMaker Studio 2
  • Aseprite
  • Gimp
  • FL Studio 20
  • LabChirp
  • Bfxr
